channel.title: Pharrell Williams on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Pharrell Williams on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘In Whose Name?’ Review: The Chronicle of Kanye West’s Chaos That You Never Asked For
item.description: Filmmaker Nico Ballesteros followed the hip-hop superstar for six years, through marital troubles with Kim Kardashian, anti-Semitic outbursts and a budding relationship with Donald Trump.

item.title: ‘In Whose Name?’ Review: The Chronicle of Kanye West’s Chaos That You Never Asked For
item.description: Filmmaker Nico Ballesteros followed the hip-hop superstar for six years, through marital troubles with Kim Kardashian, anti-Semitic outbursts and a budding relationship with Donald Trump.

item.title: Grace for the World: Disney+, Hulu and ABC News’ Vatican Concert Adds Jennifer Hudson, BamBam to Lineup (Exclusive)
item.description: The historic free concert, set to be streamed live from St. Peter’s Square, will feature Pharrell Williams, Andrea Bocelli, John Legend, Karol G, Clipse, Teddy Swims and Jelly Roll.
